attributes.action: Give Nurses the same percentage rise .That the politicians granted themselves
attributes.additional_details: Giving all medical Nursing staff a pay rise, and not keeping the Nursing profession to a measly 1%. which was negotiated in 2018, pre covid19 .
attributes.background: give the Nurses and care workers , a pay rise commensurate with the risks they are taking, granting themselves an 11% increase , in a non dangerous job , is an insult to the people on the front line
